description:
Are you ready to create a more successful, more substantial small business?

This course will help you gain CLARITY and a fundamental strategy for growing your small business..

This course provides a general introduction to

This course is designed for small and medium sized business owners, whether offline or online, who are passionate about their product or service, care about their customers, clients, patients or patrons, and want to create a more substantial, successful business.

This is a practical, strategic look at WHAT TO FOCUS ON when leading your business to the next level.
title: The 5 IMMUTABLE Growth Principles for Every Small Business
